bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with er long 耳聾② , deafness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry chang pu 菖蒲 quoting Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 , Substance Entry shui su 水蘇 quoting Shi liao ben cao 食療本草 , and Substance Entry bi ma 蓖麻 quoting Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 , and Substance Entry mu xiang 木香 quoting Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 : er long 耳聾 , “deafness”, always writes: 耳卒聾 閉 , “Ears with sudden deafness blockage ”.
